name: Rafini Staff [3]
description: A stick made of the stones frequently used by the Lamini clan when gathering magic.

name: Ragamuffin Manteau
description: A good defensive cloak for magic.

name: Ragamuffin Manteau [1]
description: A good defensive cloak for magic.

name: Ragamuffin Manteau [2]
description: A good defensive cloak for magic.

name: Rage Cake
description: The cute cake filled with strange candy, eating it Taunts people's anger. Within 60 seconds, each auto attack deals 200 points of True Dmg. This item can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Rage of Asgard
description: This big hammer is made from the Shards of Asa God realm. In the war of "The Dusk of The Gods", it not only won the great snake Jormungandr, but also destroyed the area of tens of thousands of kilometers in ruins just within a second. (Better used as the weapon skin)

name: Rain Flute
description: Wenbala Rain Clan's traditional instrument, sounds sharp and pretty. How many stories are hiding in the OG music?

name: Rainbow Bridge
description: The rainbow bridge leading to divinity becomes a finger wheel that ties you and me so we will never be separated.

name: Rainbow Peco Peco Hairband
description: Helmet that makes you feel the wings of Peco Peco are attached to your body. It can move as fast as Peco Peco.

name: Rainbow Peco Peco Hairband Blueprint
description: Helmet that makes you feel the wings of Peco Peco are attached to your body. It can move as fast as Peco Peco.

name: Ramen Hat
description: Ramen on the head. Eat it when you're hungry!

name: Ramen Hat [1]
description: Ramen on the head. Eat it when you're hungry!
